entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this morning. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 22. POP 30%
